publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4847 Brian Adam: Offshore Europe Exhibition Good for Aberdeen and for Scotland—That the Parliament congratulates the City of Aberdeen for playing host to the most successful ever Offshore Europe Exhibition; recognises the outstanding efforts of the organisers, Aberdeen Exhibition and Conference Centre, the council and the citizens of Aberdeen city and shire in welcoming the 47,000 visitors to the event, and wishes the many contributors well in planning for the 2011 event.

S3M-4847 Offshore Europe Exhibition Good for Aberdeen and for Scotland (lodged on 14 September 2009) Kenneth Gibson*, Dave Thompson*, Rob Gibson*, Jamie Hepburn*, Robin Harper*, Bob Doris*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Aitken*
S3M-4847 Offshore Europe Exhibition Good for Aberdeen and for Scotland (lodged on 14 September 2009) Gil Paterson*, Maureen Watt*, Nanette Milne*
S3M-4847 Offshore Europe Exhibition Good for Aberdeen and for Scotland (lodged on 14 September 2009) Liam McArthur*

S3M-4847 Brian Adam: Offshore Europe Exhibition Good for Aberdeen and for Scotland—That the Parliament congratulates the City of Aberdeen for playing host to the most successful ever Offshore Europe Exhibition; recognises the outstanding efforts of the organisers, Aberdeen Exhibition and Conference Centre, the council and the citizens of Aberdeen city and shire in welcoming the 47,000 visitors to the event, and wishes the many contributors well in planning for the 2011 event. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson, Dave Thompson, Rob Gibson, Jamie Hepburn, Robin Harper, Bob Doris, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Stuart McMillan, Bill Kidd, Gil Paterson, Maureen Watt, Nanette Milne, Liam McArthur, Michael Matheson*
S3M-4847 Offshore Europe Exhibition Good for Aberdeen and for Scotland (lodged on 14 September 2009) Alison McInnes*
S3M-4847 Offshore Europe Exhibition Good for Aberdeen and for Scotland (lodged on 14 September 2009) Nicol Stephen*
